com.att.research.xacml.std

Class StdDataTypeFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.api.DataTypeFactory
      • com.att.research.xacml.std.StdDataTypeFactory

  • public class StdDataTypeFactory
extends DataTypeFactory
    Implements the DataTypeFactory interface to support all of the data types in the XACML 3.0 specification.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.2 $
    Author:
    Christopher A. Rath

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StdDataTypeFactory()
      Creates a new StdDataTypeFactory and initializes the mapping from Identifiers for XACML data types to the DataType class instance that implements that data type.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataType<?> getDataType(Identifier dataTypeId)
      Maps the given Identifier representing a XACML data type id to a DataType object implementing that data type.

        newInstance, newInstance, newInstance

    • Method Detail

      • getDataType

        public DataType<?> getDataType(Identifier dataTypeId)
        Description copied from class: DataTypeFactory
        Maps the given Identifier representing a XACML data type id to a DataType object implementing that data type.
        Specified by:
        getDataType in class DataTypeFactory
        Parameters:
        dataTypeId - the Identifier of the DataType to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the DataType with the given Identifier or null if there is no match.
